name: RubellaTestsForRubellaVirusIgGAntibodyRatioInSerum
title: Rubella (Tests for rubella virus IgG Antibody [Ratio] in Serum)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Rubella virus IgG antibody (ratio between 1st and 2nd specimen) in serum),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Rubella IgG Ab ratio),(Exclusion Criteria: avidity test)
